headline: Alexandria Real Estate price target lowered to $105 from $110 at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies analyst Peter Abramowitz lowered the firm’s price target on Alexandria Real Estate (ARE) to $105 from $110 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares as part of a 2025 outlook. Within healthcare real estate investment trusts, the firm prefers senior housing, saying deliveries are “muted” while the 80-plus population is entering a high-growth period. Ventas (VTR) is the analyst’s top pick, and it is also positive on Welltower (WELL) and Sabra Health Care REIT (SBRA). Within the other subsect
